paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In the case of the KCNH2 T895M mutation, the proband was an adult male patient with persistent AF who underwent a cardiac ablation procedure.

functional_data.summary: Experimental data showed significantly higher peak and tail current densities and an increase in the values of the time constant at −40 and −30 mV.

variants.additional_notes: The mutation is associated with increased susceptibility to arrhythmias.
key_quotes: Experimental data showed significantly higher peak and tail current densities and an increase in the values of the time constant at −40 and −30 mV.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient found with the KCNH2 T436M mutation was instead suffering from persistent AF.

functional_data.summary: The patient presented higher values for peak current density and time constants.

variants.additional_notes: The mutation is associated with increased susceptibility to arrhythmias.
key_quotes: The patient found with the KCNH2 T436M mutation was instead suffering from persistent AF.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for KCNH2 variants were extracted successfully.
